data.title: Black Hills Film Festival
data.text:
The 15th annual Festival is September 27th - September 29th.

​

The influential film festival in the Black Hills returns this coming September with new films, merchandise, filmmaker insights, special guests, seminars, networking, and more.

We are excited to promote the art of independent film throughout the Black Hills region.

Opening night reception, introduction to filmmakers and special guests will be hosted by the Journey Museum in Rapid City, SD Sept. 27 and followed by a special film presentation "The Best We've Got: The Carl Erskine Story." Films continue at the Hill City High School Theater in Hill City, SD Sept. 28 - 29.

​

A FREE workshop (open to the public) on lighting for film will be held on Saturday morning.

Sunday's program features a presentation by local Native American Actor, Sam Shoulder.
